# PROJECT_DISPLAY_NAME - AI Agent Instructions

> **For quick reference, see**: `../AGENTS.md`

## Project Overview

PROJECT_DISPLAY_NAME is [detailed description].

**Repository**: https://github.com/USERNAME/PROJECT_NAME  
**Tech Stack**: Python 3.9+, pytest, ruff, mypy

---

## Critical Conventions

1. **Code Style**: Follow PEP 8, enforced by ruff (line length 88)
2. **Testing**: TDD approach, aim for 80%+ coverage
3. **Type Hints**: Required for all public functions
4. **Documentation**: Update docs/ with all changes

---

## Common Gotchas

1. Always activate virtual environment before working
2. Use absolute imports from package root
3. Keep tests isolated and fast
4. Update CHANGELOG.md for user-facing changes

---

## Development Workflow

1. Create feature branch from `main`
2. Write tests first (TDD)
3. Implement feature
4. Run quality checks (lint, type check, test)
5. Update documentation
6. Create pull request

---

## Quality Gates

- All tests pass
- Ruff linting passes
- Mypy type checking passes
- Coverage >= 80%
- Documentation updated

---

**See AGENTS.md for quick reference and common commands**
